title: I have just updated/installed a new Operating System. Why is my license failing to activate?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have just installed Windows 10 on my computer.
  • I just updated my Operating System
  • On opening Unity, I receive an error and it will not activate.

sections.title: Cause
content: Unfortunately, sometimes our licenses are confused by a change in OS - essentially, it tricks the license file into thinking it is being activated on a new machine, which can cause problems if you have already maxed out your activations.

sections.title: Resolution
content: * Windows: C:ProgramData/Unity (If the files are hidden, you need to click View and tick the Hidden Items check box.)
4) Download Unity again from our website
5) Reinstall, remembering to select ‘activate free version’ when prompted for Personal, or enter your serial number for Plus or Pro.
